dct_title_s: Carte des provinces méridionales des États-Unis
dct_description_sm: Prime meridian: Paris. In upper right margin: III. Relief shown pictorially. Shows Kentucky, "Virginie," "Tennassee," "Caroline Septentrionale," "Territoire des Etats-Unis," "Caroline Meridionale," and "Georgie." From: Vie de George Washington : collection de planches / par John Marshall. Paris : Dentu, 1807. Maps by Jean-Nicolas Buache. cf. Tooley's dictionary of mapmakers, vol. 1.
